Simply wear the headphones, as the suspension headbands automatically adjust according to the user's comfort. No manual adjustment for the headband is required.
The In-line controller helps to control the volume level and the mic On/Off button.
Lightweight design, comfortable and soft ear cushions and suspension headbands for long hours of gaming.
